1.12.1.1.0:
- Fixed CME when the player is getting killed (no, the crashing wasn't intentional)
- The Shub-Niggurath ritual now spawns some Dark Offspring in the mix (instead of just sheep)
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.12
1.12.1.0.1:
- Stability fixes for Azathoth's digestive tract (fewer worlds getting regurgitated in singleplayer)
- Fixed inventory slot contents incorrectly being set to null instead of ItemStack.EMPTY
